info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: Gets information about all public IP addresses on a virtual machine scale set level.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of PublicIPInterface resources.

schema.description: Response for ListPublicIpAddresses API service call.

get.description: Gets information about all public IP addresses in a virtual machine IP configuration in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: virtualmachineIndex
parameters.description: The virtual machine index.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The network interface name.

parameters.name: ipConfigurationName
parameters.description: The IP configuration name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of PublicIPAddress resources.

schema.description: Response for ListPublicIpAddresses API service call.

get.description: Get the specified public IP address in a virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualMachineScaleSetName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual machine scale set.

parameters.name: virtualmachineIndex
parameters.description: The virtual machine index.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: ipConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the IP configuration.

parameters.name: publicIpAddressName
parameters.description: The name of the public IP Address.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting PublicIPAddress resource.
